boho dena patta gahana mathrukawak.meke thiyenne paraduna premayak boho kello pattagahana sindarella fantasiyak.eeke athi nawum bawak nathibawa kanagatuwen wuwath kiwa yuthuyi.me mulawen midenna anun sandaha liyanne nathuwa thaman sandaha liyanna.ewita nawum nirmana bihiwewi.boho aya kiyanawa wage wishishtayi kiyala obawa murunga aththe thiyanna mata oone na.hondanirmana bihiwimata wiwechanaya bohoma wadagath bawa mage hangima.manikak nikam polawa yata thibunata watinakama aduyi eya hondata kapa opamattam kala wita watinakama wadiyi.thani wadane wichara walata hasu nowi honda nawum nirmana kirimata obata shakthiya.

inpasu enam thishathara wasarakata pasu yalith warak melesa sarwagnya dhathu pradarshanayak merata pawathwima lakwasi bodu danan thula bodu bathiyen neth sith pubuduwalimata samath mahangi punyethsawayak lesa handinwiya hakiya.budurajanan wahanse piriniwanpamen pasu ema shri dehaya aadahanaya kirimen anathuruwa sarwagnya dhathun bedadime uthsawayedi shakyawanshika gnyathinta labadun dhathun wahanse kapilawasthu puraye thanpath kala bawa sandahan we. 1898 wasaredi erata purawidyagnyayin wisin nepalaye sidu kala kanimwaladi kapilawasthupura aithihasika bauddha natabun soyagena athi athara 1971 – 1977 kalasimawedi da wadiduratath ehi kanim sidukota atha.

wasara 1816di yakada walata manganis ekathu kirimen eya wadath shakthimath wana bawath, bhangura bawa adu wana bawath soya ganu labiya. 1837di brithanya jathika jems kupar pathal aashrithawa manganis lohayata nirawaranaya wimen pakinsan rogaya wani rogayak athi wiya haki bawa soya ganna ladi.1912di widyuth rasayanikawa manganis posfet galwimen thuwakku kadiyama walakwiya haki bawa soya ganuni. 1866di leklanch koshaya soya ganimen pasuwa kathodiya widhrawikaya lesa manganis dayoksayid wala watinakama wadi wiya.
